name: The Elder Scrolls Travels: Oblivion
description:
The Elder Scrolls Travels: Oblivion DEMO is a Action RPG video game published by Bethesda Softworks released on March 20th, 2006 for the PlayStation Portable.

Cancelled PSP version, Full game release in March 20, 2006 for Microsoft Windows, Playstation 3 and Xbox 360. On May 20, 2016, a pack of Demo-beta versions dated 2006-2007 leaked to the light.
